snippet: The $20 billion deal to sell most of itself to SoftBank of Japan is Sprint’s boldest move yet to revive its fortunes.
abstract: The $20 billion deal to sell most of itself to SoftBank of Japan is Sprint’s boldest move yet to revive its fortunes.

headline.main: Sprint Agrees to Sell Majority Stake to SoftBank
